title: William Shakespeare's Hamlet [Branagh] [Captioned]
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Literature/English literature - Film and video adaptations
Literature/Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616 - Film and video adaptations
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures
description: A massive all star cast brings to life this full text version of William Shakespeare's Hamlet. With his usual brash exuberance and strong visual style Kenneth Branagh works hard to keep the pace rolling, integrating the acting styles of experienced Shakespearian theatre actors such as Judi Dench, Richard Briers and Derek Jacobi with an international movie star cast, including Gerard Depardieu, Charleton Heston, Richard Attenborough and Julie Christie.
